p.strong: Hit Points. Hit Dice: 1d8 per Inquisitor level. Hit Points at 1st Level: 8 + your Constitution modifier. Hit Points at Higher Levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per Inquisitor level after 1st.

Proficiencies. Armor: Light Armour. Weapons: Simple Blasters, Simple or Martial Lightweapons with Finesse Property, Simple or Martial Vibroweapons with finesse property. Saving Throws: Dexterity and Intelligence.
Skills. Choose 4 from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, Stealth.
Spell Save DC. 8 + Charisma modifier + Proficiency Bonus.

description.p: Beginning at 1st level, you know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.
You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't incapacitated, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
The amount of the extra damage increases as you gain levels in this class, as shown in the Assassinate column below.

sheet.description: Once per turn, you can deal an extra {{assassinate:count}}d{{assassinate:die}} damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon. You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't incapacitated, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 45 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Concentration, Up to 1 round; You use the Force to manipulate a small or medium object, or a small creature, that you can see within range. You make an ability check using your Force ability, contested by the target’s Strength check. On a success, you may suspend and/or move up to 30 feet or throw the target. If you choose to suspend the target, it remains suspended for the duration. If you throw the target, make a ranged Force attack with a range of 30/60 feet. On a hit, the target you throw at takes kinetic damage based on what is thrown: Small object: 2d4 kinetic damage, Medium object: 2d6 kinetic damage, Small creature: 1d4 kinetic damage. If a creature is thrown, the thrown small creature takes 1d8 + your Force ability modifier kinetic damage.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 45 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Concentration, Up to 1 round; You use the Force to manipulate a small or medium object, or a small creature, that you can see within range. You make an ability check using your Force ability, contested by the target’s Strength check. On a success, you may suspend and/or move up to 30 feet or throw the target. If you choose to suspend the target, it remains suspended for the duration. If you throw the target, make a ranged Force attack with a range of 30/60 feet. On a hit, the target you throw at takes kinetic damage based on what is thrown: Small object: 2d4 kinetic damage, Medium object: 2d6 kinetic damage, Small creature: 1d4 kinetic damage. If a creature is thrown, the thrown small creature takes 1d8 + your Force ability modifier kinetic damage.

description.p: Gain expertise in a skill you're proficient with.

sheet.description: Gain expertise in a skill you're proficient with.

description.p: Choose a feat to further customize your character.
Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide actions as a Bonus Action.

sheet.description: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide actions as a Bonus Action.

description.p: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can halve the attack's damage against you.

sheet.description: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can halve the attack's damage against you.

description.p: When making a Dexterity saving throw: On a failed save take half damage. On a successgul save take no damage (can't use when incapacitated).

sheet.description: When making a Dexterity saving throw: On a failed save take half damage. On a successgul save take no damage (can't use when incapacitated).

description.p: When you make an ability check with a skill you're proficient with, the lowest you can throw is 10.

sheet.description: When you make an ability check with a skill you're proficient with, the lowest you can throw is 10.

description.p: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

description.p: No attack roll can have advantage on you unless you're incapacitated.

sheet.description: No attack roll can have advantage on you unless you're incapacitated.

description.p: If your attack misses a target within range, you can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if you fail an ability check, turn the roll into a 20 once per short rest.

sheet.description: If your attack misses a target within range, you can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if you fail an ability check, turn the roll into a 20 once per short rest.

description.p: Trickster - See Inquisitor class description for details.
Manipulator - See Inquisitor class description for details.
You gain a feature from your Inquisitor subclass.
Choose a Inquisitor subclass that defines your specialized path.
Shadow form

Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: 10 turns; Choose a target you can see within range. That creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is blinded. On a successful save, the creature isn't blinded.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: 10 turns; Choose a target you can see within range. That creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is blinded. On a successful save, the creature isn't blinded.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Bonus Action; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Until the end of your next turn; When hiding successfully, you can turn invisible.

setters.set: Until the end of your next turn

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Bonus Action; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Until the end of your next turn; When hiding successfully, you can turn invisible.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Reaction; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Until the end of your next turn; When killing a creature, turn invisible.

setters.set: Until the end of your next turn

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Reaction; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Until the end of your next turn; When killing a creature, turn invisible.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Concentration, Up to 4 rounds; Choose a point within range and create a circle with a radius of 20 feet. The area becomes pitch black and is heavily obscured to all who stand in it except yourself.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Concentration, Up to 4 rounds; Choose a point within range and create a circle with a radius of 20 feet. The area becomes pitch black and is heavily obscured to all who stand in it except yourself.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Instantaneous; This ability allows you to walk through walls. You may pass through up to 5 feet of solid material and must end your movement outside the wall

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Instantaneous; This ability allows you to walk through walls. You may pass through up to 5 feet of solid material and must end your movement outside the wall

description.p: Trickster form
Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Concentration, Up to 10 minutes; Use the Force to disguise yourself by altering people's perception of you.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: Self; Components: None; Duration: Concentration, Up to 10 minutes; Use the Force to disguise yourself by altering people's perception of you.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Bonus Action; Range: Up to double your movement; Components: None; Duration: Instantaneous; You can teleport to an enemy up to double your movement away. This does not break stealth unless you teleport into line of sight.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Bonus Action; Range: Up to double your movement; Components: None; Duration: Instantaneous; You can teleport to an enemy up to double your movement away. This does not break stealth unless you teleport into line of sight.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Bonus Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: 2 rounds; Use the Force to make an illusion within range. Targets who can see the illusion must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes distracted. Creatures attacking a distracted target have advantage, and distracted targets have disadvantage on saving throws. As soon as they're hit, they are no longer distracted. On a successful save, the creature isn't distracted.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Bonus Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: 2 rounds; Use the Force to make an illusion within range. Targets who can see the illusion must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes distracted. Creatures attacking a distracted target have advantage, and distracted targets have disadvantage on saving throws. As soon as they're hit, they are no longer distracted. On a successful save, the creature isn't distracted.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: None; Duration: 1 round; Use the Force to make a creature's worst nightmare seem real. All creatures within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened. On a successful save, the creature doesn't become frightened.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: None; Duration: 1 round; Use the Force to make a creature's worst nightmare seem real. All creatures within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened. On a successful save, the creature doesn't become frightened.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 15 feet; Components: None; Duration: Instantaneous; Make a dark spirit clone of yourself that has 1 Hit Point within range. This dark spirit must roll initiative, has 3/4th of your AC rounded up, and has all your abilities except your subclass abilities. You are limited to 1 spirit at a time.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 15 feet; Components: None; Duration: Instantaneous; Make a dark spirit clone of yourself that has 1 Hit Point within range. This dark spirit must roll initiative, has 3/4th of your AC rounded up, and has all your abilities except your subclass abilities. You are limited to 1 spirit at a time.

description.p: Manipulator form

Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Until the end of their next turn; Use the Force to trap someone in their own mind. The creature must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, they become trapped. Stunning them for the duration or until they get hit. On a successful save, they don't get trapped.

setters.set: Until the end of their next turn

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Until the end of their next turn; Use the Force to trap someone in their own mind. The creature must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, they become trapped. Stunning them for the duration or until they get hit. On a successful save, they don't get trapped.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Concentration, Up to 1 round; Use the Force to freeze someone in place. You make an ability check using your Force ability, contested by the target's Strength check. On a success, the target is immobilized.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 30 feet; Components: Somatic; Duration: Concentration, Up to 1 round; Use the Force to freeze someone in place. You make an ability check using your Force ability, contested by the target's Strength check. On a success, the target is immobilized.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: None; Duration: Until the end of their next turn; Use the Force to confuse a creature. The creature must make an Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they must attack the nearest creature on their next turn. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected.

setters.set: Until the end of their next turn

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: None; Duration: Until the end of their next turn; Use the Force to confuse a creature. The creature must make an Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they must attack the nearest creature on their next turn. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: Touch; Components: None; Duration: 1 minute; Use the Force to forcibly read a creature’s mind, accessing both current thoughts and hidden memories. The target must be restrained in order to use this.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: Touch; Components: None; Duration: 1 minute; Use the Force to forcibly read a creature’s mind, accessing both current thoughts and hidden memories. The target must be restrained in order to use this.

description.p: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: None; Duration: 3 rounds; Use the Force to link your life force to a hostile creature. Whenever you take damage, the linked creature must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes half of the damage as kinetic damage you would have taken and you take half of the damage as the damage type of the original attack. On a successful save, the creature takes no damage and you take full damage as the damage type of the original attack. You can only link to one creature.

sheet.description: Cantrip, Casting Time: 1 Action; Range: 60 feet; Components: None; Duration: 3 rounds; Use the Force to link your life force to a hostile creature. Whenever you take damage, the linked creature must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes half of the damage as kinetic damage you would have taken and you take half of the damage as the damage type of the original attack. On a successful save, the creature takes no damage and you take full damage as the damage type of the original attack. You can only link to one creature.

description.p: An Inquisitor's power comes from the dark side of the Force. You have learned to draw on this power to cast spells.
Cantrips. You know the Minor Telekinesis cantrip.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Inquisitor spells, since the power of your magic relies on your ability to project your will into the world. You use your Charisma whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Charisma modifier when setting the saving throw DC for an Inquisitor spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.
Spell Save DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier
Spell Attack Modifier = your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier

sheet.description: Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Inquisitor spells. Your spell save DC is 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier, and your spell attack modifier is your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier.
